description:
My place is close to Taverna Kyclades, Watawa Sushi, MP Taverna, The Bonnie... The greatest cultural diversity in NYC . 
You’ll love my place because of the relaxed Astoria vibe; you are steps from NYC.
. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: The Whole Astorian's ArtPAD
review: The Art Pad is a great place to stay in Queens. The location is wonderfull and the design and details of the apt is awsome!! Kevin is a great host !! Absolutely recomendable ! Looking foward to visit the padres again :)
